content.title: Chief Ministergi Shotharabasingi Tengbang (CMST): Scholarship Of Students With Disabilities
content.department: Social Welfare Department, Govt. of Manipur
content.details: 'Chief Ministergi Shotharabasingi Tengbang (CMST): Scholarship of Students with Disabilities' is a Scholarship Scheme by the Social Welfare Department, Govt. of Manipur. In this scheme, the Students with Disability (SwD) who are a domicile of the State of Manipur, and are studying in Class 1st and above are awarded with scholarship of upto ₹ 8,000/-. The student must be enrolled in a school/college/university/institution recognized by the Govt. of Manipur. The amount of the scholarship shall be disbursed directly into the bank account of the beneficiary.
benefits: Class: 1st to 5th; Rate of Scholarship (per annum): ₹ 3,000/-
Class: 6th to 8th; Rate of Scholarship (per annum): ₹ 4,000/-
Class: 9th to 12th; Rate of Scholarship (per annum): ₹ 6,000/-
eligibility: The applicant should be a Person with Disability (PwD)
The applicant should be a Student
The applicant should be a domicile of the State of Manipur
The applicant should be studying in Class 1st and above
The applicant should be enrolled in a school/college/university/institution recognized by the Govt. of Manipur
The applicant should not be availing scholarship under any other similar scheme from any source
content.application_process: Offline. The application form can be downloaded from the Department’s website or collected from the District Social Welfare Offices, Office of CDPOs. The application forms are also available during MeeyamgiNumit at Chief Minister’s Darbar Hall. Fill in the mandatory fields of the Application Form, attach the supporting (self-attested) documents and the passport sized photograph. Submit the form in the Office of the District Social Welfare Officer concerned.
documents_required: Disability Certificate (issued by the Competent Authority)
Aadhar Card/ Enrollment Number/ ID Card (issued by competent authority)
Passing Certificate / Marksheet of the Latest Education Qualification

faqs.question: Is 'Scholarship Of Students With Disabilities' An Umbrella Scheme Under 'Chief Ministergi Shotharabasingi Tengbang (CMST)'?
faqs.answer: Yes, 'Scholarship of Students with Disabilities' is an Umbrella Scheme under 'Chief Ministergi Shotharabasingi Tengbang (CMST)'.

faqs.question: Which Department Manages This Scheme?
faqs.answer: The 'CMST: Scholarship of Students with Disabilities' is managed by the Social Welfare Department, Govt. of Manipur.

faqs.question: Can Female Students Also Apply To This Scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, this scheme is open to applicants from all genders.

faqs.question: Is There Any Age-Criteria For This Scheme?
faqs.answer: No, there is no age-criteria for this scheme.

faqs.question: What Is The Maximum Amount Of Scholarship That A Student Can Get Through This Scheme?
faqs.answer: The maximum amount of scholarship that a student can get through this scheme is ₹ 8,000/- per annum.

faqs.question: Will The Amount Of The Scholarship Be Disbursed In Installments Or As A Lump Sum?
faqs.answer: The amount of the scholarship shall be disbursed as a lump sum.

faqs.question: Is It Mandatory For The Applicant To Be Domicile Of The State Of Manipur?
faqs.answer: Yes, in order to be eligible, the applicant should be a domicile of the State of Manipur.

faqs.question: Does This Scheme Accepts Online Application?
faqs.answer: No, this scheme only accepts offline applications.
